```{python}
import sys

import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import numpy as np
import torch
import torch.nn.functional as F
from captum.attr import LRP, IntegratedGradients, NoiseTunnel, Occlusion
from captum.attr import visualization as viz
from matplotlib.colors import LinearSegmentedColormap
from PIL import Image
```

```{python}
sys.path.append("..")
```

```{python}
from birder.common import fs_ops, lib
from birder.common.lib import get_label_from_path
from birder.conf import settings
from birder.transforms.classification import inference_preset
```

```{python}
# %cd ..
```

```{python}
default_cmap = LinearSegmentedColormap.from_list(
    "custom blue", [(0, "#ffffff"), (0.25, "#000000"), (1, "#000000")], N=256
)
```

```{python}
network = "efficientnet_v2"
# network = "swin_transformer_v2"
net_param = 0
epoch = 0
```

```{python}
device = torch.device("cpu")
(net, class_to_idx, signature, rgb_stats) = fs_ops.load_model(
    device, network, net_param=net_param, epoch=epoch, inference=True
)
idx_to_class = dict(zip(class_to_idx.values(), class_to_idx.keys()))
size = lib.get_size_from_signature(signature)[0]
transform = inference_preset(size, rgb_stats, 1.0)
```

```{python}
# image = "../data/testing/Lesser kestrel/000202.jpeg"
image = "../data/testing/Bluethroat/000202.jpeg"
# image = "../data/testing/Lesser grey shrike/000200.jpeg"
# image = "../data/testing/Great bittern/000107.jpeg"
# image = "../data/testing/Crowned sandgrouse/000012.jpeg"
img = Image.open(image)
input_tensor = transform(img).unsqueeze(dim=0).to(device)
```

```{python}
output = F.softmax(net(input_tensor), dim=1)
(prob, class_idx) = torch.topk(output, k=1)
class_idx.squeeze_()
prob.squeeze_()

print(
    f"Predicted {idx_to_class[class_idx.cpu().detach().item()]} ({prob.cpu().detach().item():.3f})"
)
img
```

```{python}
integrated_gradients = IntegratedGradients(net)
attributions_ig = integrated_gradients.attribute(
    input_tensor, target=class_idx, n_steps=128, internal_batch_size=16
)
```

```{python}
_ = viz.visualize_image_attr_multiple(
    np.transpose(attributions_ig.squeeze().cpu().detach().numpy(), (1, 2, 0)),
    np.array(img.resize([size, size])),
    ["original_image", "heat_map"],
    ["all", "positive"],
    cmap=default_cmap,
    show_colorbar=True,
    outlier_perc=1,
    fig_size=(12, 8),
)
```

```{python}
occlusion = Occlusion(net)
attributions_occ = occlusion.attribute(
    input_tensor,
    strides=(3, 14, 14),
    target=class_idx,
    sliding_window_shapes=(3, 32, 32),
    baselines=0,
)
```

```{python}
_ = viz.visualize_image_attr_multiple(
    np.transpose(attributions_occ.squeeze().cpu().detach().numpy(), (1, 2, 0)),
    np.array(img.resize([size, size])),
    ["original_image", "heat_map"],
    ["all", "all"],
    show_colorbar=True,
    outlier_perc=2,
    fig_size=(12, 8),
)
```

```{python}
noise_tunnel = NoiseTunnel(integrated_gradients)
attributions_ig_nt = noise_tunnel.attribute(
    input_tensor,
    nt_samples=4,
    nt_samples_batch_size=1,
    nt_type="smoothgrad_sq",
    target=class_idx,
)
```

```{python}
_ = viz.visualize_image_attr_multiple(
    np.transpose(attributions_ig_nt.squeeze().cpu().detach().numpy(), (1, 2, 0)),
    np.array(img.resize([size, size])),
    ["original_image", "heat_map"],
    ["all", "positive"],
    cmap=default_cmap,
    show_colorbar=True,
    fig_size=(12, 8),
)
```
